RelatedSentence: Ghana meets Naija returns in its fourth year , with an even bigger and more exciting package for music fans in both Ghana and Nigeria and the world at large .

This year 's edition slated for Saturday 24th May 2014 at the Accra International Conference Centre is set to feature performances from seasoned musicians , including Sarkodie , Shatta Wale , Castro , Guru , AK Songstress , Davido , Kcee , Wizboyy and Selebobo .
He is a multi- talented TV personality who has steadily risen into stardom to become one of the promising actors Africa can boast of .
